text: My Wife's Best Friend is a 1952 American romantic comedy movie directed by Richard Sale and starring Anne Baxter, Macdonald Carey, Cecil Kellaway, Catherine McLeod. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1952 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Sale Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: My Wife's Best Friend
